songs.lyrics:
[Hook: Wifisfuneral]
Today I woke up flexing
Tomorrow i'll be surfing
That nigga tried finessing
I swear he don't want problems
Need them hundreds, need them benjis by the bundle
They told me that I'll never be shit
Reasons why i'm never humble
Today I woke up flexing
Tomorrow i'll be surfing
That nigga tried finessing
I swear he don't want problems
Need them hundreds, need them benjis by the bundle
They told me that I'll never be shit
Reasons why i'm never humble

[Verse 1: Wifisfuneral]
Slow movement, toe to toe motion
Speaking and geeking, blow smoke in the open
I flex with a bitch who suck dick with a twitch when she tweaking
Nigga call up the deacon. I'm feeling blessed
Your hoe saw the squad and got too obsessed
As I stunt in the open she gets possessed
From Palm Beach to Tokyo bitch i'm flexing
And if that bitch with the squad then its ???

[Verse 2: SKYXXX]
Woke up in the morning with a bad bitch
But that's bull she didn't even give me head last night
But I hit her with the pipe
Knocked out, ding-ding, sleep tight, alright
Motherfucker, Motherfucker
Pull up in a Caddy hanging out the window blowing on the indo
Mother fuck your image ill be pimping
Bitches, I be getting money
Young nigga 'bout his business
Fuck how you living
Swamp Posse in this bitch that's light (that's light)

[Verse 3: Wifisfuneral]
Double cups full of that drink
Don't fuck with no bitch if her pussy be stank
Blowing, smoking, choking, all on this swisher that's full of that dank
Pop a bomb on a bitch while we kissing that paint
Smoking weed on the way to the bank
Pockets full of blue Benjamin Frank
That president stay on my residence
Throw it back on a bitch if her ass is too stank

[Verse 4: Max P]
If her ass is too stank we hit up the bank
Sipping on pink
Cruise through the bay
All white benz, no mcdonalds, my niggas be whipping the K
Shout out to Keez them niggas is fake
Whipping a baby, I need me some dirt
On that Cadillac fuck what you say
All of my niggas are savage
Fuck you bitch pay me
That's what your claim be
Leave your ass shameless
Leave your ass brainless
My gold piece stainless
Fuck what you saying
Leave your ass shameless
My niggas ain't playing

[Verse 5: Keez]
I'm back in this bitch
Popping a couple of pills
Still riding 'round with that steel
Fuck how you feel
My nigga i'm just trying to live
I'm just trying to touch me a mil(?) go
My heart in that paint
Still dropping xanax in my drink
I love me the purple or pink
Swiper no swiping we still taking risks going(?) bank
We still taking risks going bank
The life i live a rock star's
Might catch me in a foreign car
Wife me up a pornstar
Riding with a foreign broad
Outside is for me switching lanes
Smoking dope, fucking her face now she loving the taste
Then she fuck me then ask me my name all she want is the fortune and fame
Hoe get out of my face
???
We bring that shit straight to your door
Ah we gonna penpal(?) him lets penpal(?) him
I get it for ??? at ??? cost

[Hook: Wifisfuneral]
Today I woke up flexing
Tomorrow i'll be surfing
That nigga tried finessing
I swear he don't want problems
Need them hundreds, need them benjis by the bundle
They told me that I'll never be shit
Reasons why i'm never humble
Today I woke up flexing
Tomorrow i'll be surfing
That nigga tried finessing
I swear he don't want problems
Need them hundreds, need them benjis by the bundle
They told me that I'll never be shit
Reasons why i'm never humble
songs.title: Surrrf
